model

Class TheoryItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.TheoryItem

  • public final class TheoryItem
extends java.lang.Object
    TheoryItem.java : Convenient class helps to keep track of different kinds of murders, locations, and weapons. Constants can be used as limits (1 - constant value), static methods mostly used for error checking or translating between Strings and integers
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nery Chapeton-Lamas (material from Kevin Lewis)

      • getLocationName

        public static java.lang.String getLocationName(int location)
        Converts location integer to String: Kitchen (1), Ballroom (2), Conservatory (3), Billiard (4), Library (5), Study (6), Hall (7), Lounge (8), Dining (9), Cellar (10).
        Parameters:
        location - integer to convert to String
        Returns:
        String version of location number, null if invalid integer
